trans-unit.source: Vertices at the start of an edge are drawn as points.
trans-unit.target: 边缘开始的顶点被画成点。

trans-unit.source: Vertices can be as simple as points defined by x and y values or can be more complex where each vertex contains a normal, texture coordinates and a 3D position. The QSGGeometry::AttributeSet is used to describe how the vertex data is built up. The attribute set can only be specified on construction. The QSGGeometry class provides a few convenience attributes and attribute sets by default. The defaultAttributes_Point2D() function returns an attribute set to be used in normal solid color rectangles, while the defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D function returns attributes to be used for textured 2D geometry. The vertex data is internally stored as a void * and is accessible with the vertexData() function. Convenience accessors for the common attribute sets are available with vertexDataAsPoint2D() and vertexDataAsTexturedPoint2D(). Vertex data is allocated by passing a vertex count to the constructor or by calling allocate() later.
trans-unit.target: 顶点可以与x和y值定义的点一样简单，也可以更复杂，其中每个顶点包含法线，纹理坐标和3D位置。该QSGGeometry :: AttributeSet中用来描述顶点数据是如何建立起来的。该属性集只能在构造时指定。默认情况下，QSGGeometry类提供一些便利属性和属性集。所述defaultAttributes_Point2D（）函数返回的属性集在正常纯色矩形被使用，而defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D函数返回的属性将被用于纹理化的2D几何形状。顶点数据在内部存储为 void * ，可通过vertexData访问（）功能。通用属性集的便捷访问器可通过vertexDataAsPoint2D（）和vertexDataAsTexturedPoint2D（）获得。顶点数据是通过将顶点计数传递给构造函数或稍后调用allocate（）来分配的。

trans-unit.source: Vertices can be as simple as points defined by x and y values or can be more complex where each vertex contains a normal, texture coordinates and a 3D position. The QSGGeometry::AttributeSet is used to describe how the vertex data is built up. The attribute set can only be specified on construction. The QSGGeometry class provides a few convenience attributes and attribute sets by default. The defaultAttributes_Point2D() function returns an attribute set to be used in normal solid color rectangles, while the defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D function returns attributes to be used for textured 2D geometry. The vertex data is internally stored as a void * and is accessible with the vertexData() function. Convenience accessors for the common attribute sets are available with vertexDataAsPoint2D() and vertexDataAsTexturedPoint2D(). Vertex data is allocated by passing a vertex count to the constructor or by calling allocate() later.
trans-unit.target: 顶点可以与x和y值定义的点一样简单，也可以更复杂，其中每个顶点包含法线，纹理坐标和3D位置。该QSGGeometry :: AttributeSet中用来描述顶点数据是如何建立起来的。该属性集只能在构造中指定。默认情况下，QSGGeometry类提供一些便利属性和属性集。所述defaultAttributes_Point2D（）函数返回的属性集在正常纯色矩形被使用，而defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D函数返回的属性将被用于纹理化的2D几何形状。顶点数据在内部存储为 void * ，并且可以通过vertexData访问（） 功能。通用属性集的便捷访问器可与vertexDataAsPoint2D（）和vertexDataAsTexturedPoint2D（）一起使用。顶点数据是通过将顶点计数传递给构造函数来分配的，或者是稍后再调用allocate（）来分配的。

trans-unit.source: Video encoder settings are changed, including audio, video and container settings.
trans-unit.target: 视频编码器设置被改变,包括音频、视频和容器设置。

trans-unit.source: Video filters are split into QAbstractVideoFilter and corresponding QVideoFilterRunnable instances, similar to QQuickItem and QSGNode. This is necessary to support threaded rendering scenarios. When using the threaded render loop of the Qt Quick scene graph, all rendering happens on a dedicated thread. QVideoFilterRunnable instances always live on this thread and all its functions, run(), the constructor, and the destructor, are guaranteed to be invoked on that thread with the OpenGL context bound. QAbstractVideoFilter instances live on the main (GUI) thread, like any other QObject and QQuickItem instances created from QML.
trans-unit.target: 视频过滤器分为QAbstractVideoFilter和对应的QVideoFilterRunnable实例，类似于QQuickItem和QSGNode。这对于支持线程渲染方案是必需的。使用Qt Quick场景图的线程渲染循环时，所有渲染都在专用线程上进行。QVideoFilterRunnable实例始终在此线程上运行，并保证在绑定了OpenGL上下文的情况下在该线程上调用run（），构造函数和析构函数的所有功能。与其他QObject和QQuickItem一样，QAbstractVideoFilter实例也位于主（GUI）线程上 从QML创建的实例。

trans-unit.source: Video filters are split into QAbstractVideoFilter and corresponding QVideoFilterRunnable instances, similar to QQuickItem and QSGNode. This is necessary to support threaded rendering scenarios. When using the threaded render loop of the Qt Quick scene graph, all rendering happens on a dedicated thread. QVideoFilterRunnable instances always live on this thread and all its functions, run(), the constructor, and the destructor, are guaranteed to be invoked on that thread with the OpenGL context bound. QAbstractVideoFilter instances live on the main (GUI) thread, like any other QObject and QQuickItem instances created from QML.
trans-unit.target: 视频过滤器分为QAbstractVideoFilter和对应的QVideoFilterRunnable实例，类似于QQuickItem和QSGNode。这对于支持线程渲染方案是必需的。使用Qt Quick场景图的线程渲染循环时，所有渲染都在专用线程上进行。QVideoFilterRunnable实例始终在该线程上运行，并保证在绑定了OpenGL上下文的情况下在该线程上调用run（），构造函数和析构函数的所有功能。与从QML创建的任何其他QObject和QQuickItem实例一样，QAbstractVideoFilter实例也位于主（GUI）线程上。

trans-unit.source: Video frames can come from several places - decoded media, a camera, or generated programmatically. The way pixels are described in these frames can vary greatly, and some pixel formats offer greater compression opportunities at the expense of ease of use.
trans-unit.target: 视频帧可以来自多个位置-解码的媒体，摄像机或以编程方式生成。在这些帧中描述像素的方式可能会有很大变化，某些像素格式会以使用方便为代价提供更大的压缩机会。

trans-unit.source: View classes display a header at the top to label the columns. To change the header texts, call setHeaderData() on the model. The header's labels default to the table's field names. For example:

trans-unit.source: View coordinates are the coordinates of the widget. Each unit in view coordinates corresponds to one pixel. What's special about this coordinate system is that it is relative to the widget, or viewport, and unaffected by the observed scene. The top left corner of QGraphicsView's viewport is always (0, 0), and the bottom right corner is always (viewport width, viewport height). All mouse events and drag and drop events are originally received as view coordinates, and you need to map these coordinates to the scene in order to interact with items.
trans-unit.target: 视图坐标是小部件的坐标。视图坐标中的每个单位对应一个像素。此坐标系的特殊之处在于它是相对于小部件或视口的，并且不受所观察场景的影响。QGraphicsView的视口的左上角始终为（0，0），而其右下角始终为（视口宽度，视口高度）。所有鼠标事件和拖放事件最初都是作为视图坐标接收的，并且您需要将这些坐标映射到场景以便与项目进行交互。

trans-unit.source: View delegates should be kept as simple as possible. Have just enough QML in the delegate to display the necessary information. Any additional functionality which is not immediately required (for example, if it displays more information when clicked) should not be created until needed (see the upcoming section on lazy initialization).
trans-unit.target: 视图委托应该尽可能的简单。委托中要有足够的QML来显示必要的信息。任何不是立即需要的附加功能(例如,如果它在点击时显示更多的信息)在需要之前不应该被创建(参见即将到来的关于懒惰初始化的章节)。

trans-unit.target: 使用QByteArray API的只读子集查看字节数组。

trans-unit.source: View transitions can be written without referring to any of the attributes listed above. These attributes merely provide extra details that are useful for customising view transitions.
trans-unit.target: 编写视图转换时,可以不参考上面列出的任何属性。这些属性只是提供了对自定义视图转换有用的额外细节。

trans-unit.source: View transitions have access to a ViewTransition attached property that provides details of the items that are under transition and the operation that triggered the transition. Since view transitions are run once per item, these details can be used to customize each transition for each individual item.
trans-unit.target: 视图过渡可以访问ViewTransition附加属性，该属性提供正在过渡的项目的详细信息以及触发过渡的操作。由于视图过渡每个项目运行一次，因此这些详细信息可用于自定义每个项目的每个过渡。

trans-unit.source: View transitions have access to a ViewTransition attached property that provides details of the items that are under transition and the operation that triggered the transition. Since view transitions are run once per item, these details can be used to customize each transition for each individual item.
trans-unit.target: 视图过渡可以访问附加的 ViewTransition 属性,该属性提供了正在进行过渡的项的详细信息以及触发过渡的操作。由于每个项目的视图转换只运行一次,因此这些细节可用于为每个单独的项目定制每个转换。

trans-unit.source: View3D provides a 2D surface for 3D content to be rendered to. Before 3D content can be displayed in a Qt Quick scene, it must first be flattend.
trans-unit.target: View3D为3D内容的渲染提供了一个2D表面。在3D内容能够在Qt Quick场景中显示之前,它必须首先被扁平化。

trans-unit.source: View3D provides a 2D surface on which a 3D scene can be rendered. This surface is a Qt Quick Item and can be placed in a Qt Quick scene.
trans-unit.target: View3D提供2D曲面，可以在其上渲染3D场景。该表面是Qt Quick项目，可以放置在Qt Quick场景中。

trans-unit.source: ViewSection.CurrentLabelAtStart - the current section label sticks to the start of the view as it is moved.
trans-unit.target: ViewSection.CurrentLabelAtStart--当移动时,当前部分的标签会粘在视图的开始处。

trans-unit.source: ViewSection.FirstCharacter - sections are created based on the first character of the section.property value (for example, 'A', 'B', 'C' sections, etc. for an address book)
trans-unit.target: ViewSection.FirstCharacter-根据 section.property 值的第一个字符创建部分（例如，地址簿的“ A”，“ B”，“ C”部分等）

trans-unit.source: ViewSection.FullString (default) - sections are created based on the section.property value.
trans-unit.target: ViewSection.FullString（默认值）-基于 section.property 值创建节。

trans-unit.source: ViewSection.InlineLabels - section labels are shown inline between the item delegates separating sections (default).
trans-unit.target: ViewSection.InlineLabels-节点标签在分隔节点的项目委托之间以直线方式显示(默认)。

trans-unit.source: ViewSection.NextLabelAtEnd - the next section label (beyond all visible sections) sticks to the end of the view as it is moved.
trans-unit.target: ViewSection.NextLabelAtEnd--当视图移动时,下一节标签(超越所有可见的节)会粘在视图的末端。

trans-unit.source: ViewTransition.targetIndexes - the indexes of the target items
ViewTransition.destination - the (x,y) point to which this item is moving for the relevant view operation
trans-unit.target: ViewTransition.destination-这个项目在相关视图操作中移动到的(x,y)点。

trans-unit.source: ViewTransition.index - the index of this item
ViewTransition.item - the item that is under transition

Viewfinder parameters may also depend on other camera settings, especially in video capture mode. If camera configuration conflicts with viewfinder settings, the camara configuration is usually preferred.
trans-unit.target: 取景器参数也可能取决于其他相机设置,特别是在视频捕捉模式下。如果相机配置与取景器设置冲突,通常首选camara配置。

trans-unit.source: Viewport of the scene specifies at which portion of the render surface Qt3D is rendering to. Area outside the viewport is left untouched. It also controls global parameters to the rendering in that viewport like gamma.
trans-unit.target: 场景的视口指定Qt3D渲染表面的哪一部分。视口之外的区域则不受影响。它也控制了在该视口中渲染的全局参数,如gamma。

trans-unit.source: Views are containers for collections of items. They are feature-rich and can be customizable to meet style or behavior requirements.
trans-unit.target: 视图是项目集合的容器。它们具有丰富的功能,并且可以自定义以满足风格或行为要求。

trans-unit.source: Views are encouraged to store the array of QModelRoleData objects (and, possibly, the corresponding span) and re-use it in subsequent calls to the model. This allows to reduce the memory allocations related with creating and returning QVariant objects.
trans-unit.target: 鼓励视图存储QModelRoleData对象的数组（并可能存储相应的跨度），并在随后的模型调用中重新使用它。这样可以减少与创建和返回QVariant对象有关的内存分配。

trans-unit.source: Views automatically connect to this signal and relayout items as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 视图会自动连接到这个信号,并在必要时中继输出项目。

trans-unit.source: Views should be passed by value, not by reference-to-const.
trans-unit.target: 视图应该通过值来传递,而不是通过引用到const来传递。

trans-unit.source: Virtual keyboard collects the handwriting data in a special data model QVirtualKeyboardTrace. Each trace represents a collection of data sampled from one touch (e.g. a swipe on the screen). There will be as many instances of QVirtualKeyboardTrace as there are touches on the handwriting input area.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟键盘以特殊的数据模型QVirtualKeyboardTrace收集手写数据。每条迹线代表从一次触摸（例如，在屏幕上滑动）采样的数据集合。QVirtualKeyboardTrace的实例将与手写输入区域上的触摸一样多。

trans-unit.source: Virtual keyboard loads all the extension plugins at startup. It searches for plugins/virtualkeyboard directory and matches the metadata found in the plugin. If there are two or more extension plugins with the same Name, it loads the one with the highest Version number.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟键盘会在启动时加载所有扩展插件。它搜索 plugins/virtualkeyboard 目录，并匹配在插件中找到的元数据。如果有两个或多个具有相同 Name 的扩展插件，它将加载 Version 号最高的插件。

trans-unit.source: WavefrontMesh reads the geometry from a Wavefront .obj file and generates a two-dimensional geometry from this. If the .obj file contains a three-dimensional shape, it will be orthographically projected, onto a plane. If defined, this is given by projectionPlaneV and projectionPlaneW. Otherwise, the first face encountered in the data will be used to determine the projection plane.
trans-unit.target: WavefrontMesh从Wavefront .obj文件读取几何图形，并从中生成二维几何图形。如果.obj文件包含三维形状，则将其正交投影到平面上。如果定义，则由projectionPlaneV和projectionPlaneW给出。否则，数据中遇到的第一个面将用于确定投影平面。

trans-unit.source: Wayland's design philosophy is to keep the core protocol simple and minimal. Developers can then expand on this core protocol with use-case-specific extensions. Qt Wayland Compositor supports many common extensions by default, and also has APIs to enable the creation of new, custom extensions.
trans-unit.target: Wayland的设计理念是保持核心协议的简单和最小化。开发者可以通过特定用途的扩展来扩展这个核心协议。Qt Wayland Compositor默认支持许多常见的扩展,也有API来创建新的、自定义的扩展。

trans-unit.source: We advise supporting click-to-focus for widgets that support text entry, and to avoid it for most widgets where a mouse click has a different effect. (For buttons, we also recommend adding a keyboard shortcut: QAbstractButton and its subclasses make this very easy.)
trans-unit.target: 我们建议对支持文本输入的窗口小部件支持单击焦点对准，对于大多数单击鼠标效果不同的窗口小部件，建议不要使用“单击焦点对准”。（对于按钮，我们还建议添加键盘快捷键：QAbstractButton及其子类使此操作非常容易。）

trans-unit.source: We advise supporting click-to-focus for widgets that support text entry, and to avoid it for most widgets where a mouse click has a different effect. (For buttons, we also recommend adding a keyboard shortcut: QAbstractButton and its subclasses make this very easy.)
trans-unit.target: 我们建议对支持文本输入的窗口小部件支持“单击聚焦”，对于大多数单击鼠标效果不同的窗口小部件，则建议不要使用“单击以焦点”。（对于按钮，我们还建议添加键盘快捷键：QAbstractButton及其子类使此操作非常容易。）

trans-unit.source: We advise supporting shortcut focus for all widgets that the user may want to jump to. For example, a tab dialog can have keyboard shortcuts for each of its pages, so the user can press e.g. Alt+P to step to the Printing page. It is easy to overdo this: there are only a few keys, and it's also important to provide keyboard shortcuts for commands. Alt+P is also used for Paste, Play, Print, and Print Here in the Standard Accelerator Keys list, for example.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议为用户可能希望跳转到的所有小部件提供快捷键焦点。例如，一个标签对话框可以为每个其页面的快捷键，让用户可以按如Alt + P键步骤的P打印页面。这样做很容易：只有几个键，为命令提供键盘快捷键也很重要。例如，Alt + P也可用于“ 标准加速键”列表中的“粘贴”，“播放”，“打印”和“此处打印” 。

trans-unit.source: We build the string out dynamically by appending one character to it at a time. Let's assume that we append 15000 characters to the QString string. Then the following 11 reallocations (out of a possible 15000) occur when QString runs out of space: 8, 24, 56, 120, 248, 504, 1016, 2040, 4088, 8184, 16376. At the end, the QString has 16376 Unicode characters allocated, 15000 of which are occupied.
trans-unit.target: 我们建立了串 out 通过一次追加一个字符，它动态。假设我们在QString字符串后附加15000个字符。然后，当QString空间不足时，会发生以下11个重新分配（可能的15000个）：8、24、56、120、248、504、1016、2040、4088、8184、16376。最后，QString具有16376分配了Unicode字符，其中已占用15000个字符。

trans-unit.source: We build the string out dynamically by appending one character to it at a time. Let's assume that we append 15000 characters to the QString string. Then the following 18 reallocations (out of a possible 15000) occur when QString runs out of space: 4, 8, 12, 16, 20, 52, 116, 244, 500, 1012, 2036, 4084, 6132, 8180, 10228, 12276, 14324, 16372. At the end, the QString has 16372 Unicode characters allocated, 15000 of which are occupied.

trans-unit.source: We declare the property with the Q_PROPERTY() macro in the private section of the class. The required READ function is named priority, and we include a WRITE function named setPriority. The enumeration type must be registered with the Meta-Object System using the Q_ENUM() macro. Registering an enumeration type makes the enumerator names available for use in calls to QObject::setProperty(). We must also provide our own declarations for the READ and WRITE functions. The declaration of MyClass then might look like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们在类的私有部分中使用Q_PROPERTY（）宏声明该属性。所需的 READ 函数被命名为 priority ，并且我们包含了一个名为 setPriority 的 WRITE 函数。枚举类型必须使用Q_ENUM（）宏在元对象系统中注册。注册枚举类型可使枚举器名称可用于调用QObject :: setProperty（）。我们还必须为 READ 和 WRITE 函数提供我们自己的声明。然后，MyClass的声明可能如下所示：

trans-unit.source: We do not rely on any wrapper scripts that would provide environment variables such as PKG_CONFIG_*. Rather, the path to the .pc files is specified in the toolchain file. It is likely that another sysroot will need adjustments in PKG_CONFIG_LIBDIR. For example, with a sysroot generated from a Raspberry Pi OS (formerly Raspbian) image one would use /usr/lib/arm-gnueabihf/pkgconfig instead.
trans-unit.target: 我们不依赖任何提供环境变量（如PKG_CONFIG_ *）的包装器脚本。而是在工具链文件中指定.pc文件的路径。另一个sysroot可能需要在 PKG_CONFIG_LIBDIR 中进行调整。例如，使用从Raspberry Pi OS（以前称为Raspbian）映像生成 /usr/lib/arm-gnueabihf/pkgconfig 可以改用/ usr / lib / arm-gnueabihf / pkgconfig。

trans-unit.source: We do the same for the clock's minute hand, which is defined by the four points (1, 0), (0, 1), (-1, 0), and (0, -40). These coordinates specify a hand that is thinner and longer than the minute hand.
trans-unit.target: 我们对时钟的分针也是如此,它由四点(1,0)、(0,1)、(-1,0)和(0,-40)定义。这些坐标指定了一个比分针更细更长的指针。

trans-unit.source: We do this by writing a slot that stores the request data in a persistent structure, indicating to the caller using QDBusMessage::setDelayedReply(true) that the response will be sent later.
trans-unit.target: 为此，我们编写了一个以持久结构存储请求数据的插槽，并使用QDBusMessage :: setDelayedReply（true）向调用者指示响应将在以后发送。

trans-unit.source: We draw the clock's hour hand by rotating the coordinate system and calling QPainter::drawConvexPolygon(). Thank's to the rotation, it's drawn pointed in the right direction.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过旋转坐标系并调用QPainter :: drawConvexPolygon（）来绘制时钟的时针。谢谢旋转，它指向正确的方向。

trans-unit.source: We ensure that the parent Rectangle is large enough so that there is some space left around the edges of the horizontally centered Row item.
trans-unit.target: 我们确保父矩形足够大,以便在水平居中的Row项的边缘留有一些空间。

trans-unit.source: We first save the state of the painter. This is not always necessary, but in this case the QCommonStyle needs the painter in the same state as it was when PE_IndicatorCheckBox was called (We could also set the state with function calls, of course). We then use drawButtonBackground() to draw the background of the check box indicator. This is a helper function that draws the background and also the frame of push buttons and check boxes. We take a look at that function below. We then check if the mouse is hovering over the checkbox. If it is, we draw the frame that Java checkboxes have when the box is not pressed down and the mouse is over it. You may note that Java does not handle tri-state boxes, so we have not implemented it.
trans-unit.target: 我们首先保存画家的状态。这并非总是必要的，但是在这种情况下，QCommonStyle需要绘画者的状态与调用PE_IndicatorCheckBox时的状态相同（当然，我们也可以通过函数调用来设置状态）。然后，我们使用 drawButtonBackground() 绘制复选框指示器的背景。这是一个辅助功能，可绘制背景以及按钮和复选框的框。我们在下面查看该功能。然后，我们检查鼠标是否悬停在复选框上方。如果是这样，我们将绘制Java复选框在未按下框并且鼠标悬停在其上方时所具有的框架。您可能会注意到Java不处理三态框，因此我们尚未实现它。

trans-unit.source: We have hard-coded the colors (we don't use the QPalette) for the linear gradients, which are used, for example, for button bevels, tool bars, and check boxes. This is because the Java palette cannot produce these colors. Java does not change these colors based on widget color group or role anyway (they are not dependent on the palette), so it does not present a problem in any case.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经为线性渐变对颜色进行了硬编码（我们不使用QPalette），例如用于按钮斜角，工具栏和复选框的线性渐变。这是因为Java调色板无法产生这些颜色。 Java始终不会基于小部件颜色组或角色来更改这些颜色（它们不依赖于调色板），因此在任何情况下都不会出现问题。

trans-unit.source: We have implemented a style that resembles the Java default look and feel (previously known as Metal). We have done this as it is relatively simple to implement and we wanted to build a style for this overview document. To keep it simple and not too extensive, we have simplified the style somewhat, but Qt is perfectly able to make an exact copy of the style. However, there are no concrete plans to implement the style as a part of Qt.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经实现了一种类似于Java默认外观和感觉的风格(以前称为Metal)。我们这样做是因为它的实现相对简单,而且我们想为这个概览文档建立一个风格。为了保持它的简单和不太广泛,我们在一定程度上简化了这个样式,但是Qt完全可以完全复制这个样式。不过,目前还没有具体的计划将该样式作为Qt的一部分来实现。

trans-unit.source: We have introduced the FrameGraph and the node types that compose it. We then went on to discuss a few examples to illustrate the framegraph building rules and how the Qt 3D engine uses the framegraph behind the scenes. By now you should have a pretty good overview of the FrameGraph and how it can be used (perhaps to add an early z-fill pass to a forward renderer). Also you should always keep in mind that the FrameGraph is a tool for you to use so that you are not tied down to the provided renderer and materials that Qt 3D provides out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经介绍了FrameGraph及其组成的节点类型。然后，我们继续讨论一些示例，以说明框架图构建规则以及Qt 3D引擎如何在后台使用框架图。到现在为止，您应该对FrameGraph及其使用方法有了一个很好的了解（可能是将一个早期的z-fill传递添加到一个正向渲染器中）。另外，您还应该始终牢记FrameGraph是供您使用的工具，这样您就不会被Qt 3D提供的开箱即用的渲染器和材质所束缚。

trans-unit.source: We have introduced the FrameGraph and the node types that compose it. We then went on to discuss a few examples to illustrate the framegraph building rules and how the Qt 3D engine uses the framegraph behind the scenes. By now you should have a pretty good overview of the FrameGraph and how it can be used (perhaps to add an early z-fill pass to a forward renderer). Also you should always keep in mind that the FrameGraph is a tool for you to use so that you are not tied down to the provided renderer and materials that Qt 3D provides out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 我们介绍了FrameGraph及其组成的节点类型。然后，我们继续讨论一些示例，以说明框架图构建规则以及Qt 3D引擎如何在后台使用框架图。到目前为止，您应该对FrameGraph及其使用方法有了一个很好的了解（可能是将一个早期的z-fill传递添加到正向渲染器中）。另外，您还应始终牢记FrameGraph是供您使用的工具，这样您就不会被Qt 3D提供的开箱即用的渲染器和材质所束缚。

trans-unit.source: We have introduced the FrameGraph and the node types that compose it. We then went on to discuss a few examples to illustrate the framegraph building rules and how the Qt 3D engine uses the framegraph behind the scenes. By now you should have a pretty good overview of the FrameGraph and how it can be used (perhaps to add an early z-fill pass to a forward renderer). Also you should always keep in mind that the FrameGraph is a tool for you to use so that you are not tied down to the provided renderer and materials that Qt 3D provides out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经介绍了FrameGraph及其组成的节点类型。然后，我们继续讨论一些示例，以说明框架图构建规则以及Qt 3D引擎如何在后台使用框架图。到现在为止，您应该对FrameGraph及其使用方法有了一个很好的了解（可能是将一个早期的z-fill传递添加到一个正向渲染器中）。另外，您还应该始终牢记FrameGraph是供您使用的工具，这样您就不会被Qt 3D提供的开箱即用的渲染器和材质所束缚。

trans-unit.source: We have not fully implemented every element in the Java style. This way, we have reduced the amount and complexity of the code. In general, the style was intended as a practical example for this style overview document, and not to be a part of Qt itself.
trans-unit.target: 我们并没有完全用Java风格实现每一个元素。这样,我们减少了代码的数量和复杂性。总的来说,这个样式的目的是作为这个样式概述文档的一个实际例子,而不是作为Qt本身的一部分。

trans-unit.source: We have not managed to make ActiveQt based COM objects work with the following client applications.
trans-unit.target: 我们尚未设法使基于ActiveQt的COM对象与以下客户端应用程序一起使用。

trans-unit.source: We have not managed to make ActiveQt based COM objects work with the following client applications.
trans-unit.target: 我们尚未使基于ActiveQt的COM对象与以下客户端应用程序一起使用。

trans-unit.source: We have not tried to emulate the Java fonts. Java and Qt use very different font engines, so we don't consider it worth the effort as we only use the style as an example for this overview.
trans-unit.target: 我们并没有尝试模仿Java字体。Java和Qt使用了非常不同的字体引擎,所以我们认为不值得这样做,因为我们只把这种风格作为一个例子进行概述。

trans-unit.source: We have now exposed the information we have about the slider to the clients. For the clients to be able to alter the slider - for example, to change its value - we must provide information about the actions that can be performed and perform them upon request. We discuss this in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经将我们所拥有的关于滑块的信息暴露给了客户端。为了让客户端能够改变滑块--例如,改变它的值--我们必须提供关于可以执行的操作的信息,并根据请求执行这些操作。我们将在下一节讨论这个问题。

trans-unit.source: We have only implemented ticks below the slider. Flat push buttons are also left out. We do not handle the case where the title bars and dock window titles grow too small for their contents, but simply draw sub controls over each other.
trans-unit.target: 我们只实现了滑块下方的刻度。扁平的按钮也被排除在外。我们不处理标题栏和停靠窗口标题因内容太小而变小的情况,而只是将子控件画在对方上面。

trans-unit.source: We have seen how check boxes are styled in the Java style from the time the widget gets a paint request to the time the style is finished painting. To learn in detail how each widget is painted, you need to go through the code step-by-step as we have done here. However, it is usually enough to know which style elements the widgets draw. The widget builds a style option and calls on the style one or more times to draw the style elements of which it consists. Usually, it is also sufficient to know the states a widget can be in and the other contents of the style option, i.e., what we list in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到了从widget得到画图请求到样式画完的过程中,Java样式中的复选框是如何被样式化的。要想详细了解每个widget是如何绘制的,你需要像我们在这里做的那样,一步步地去看代码。不过,通常知道widget绘制哪些样式元素就足够了。小组件会建立一个样式选项,并对样式进行一次或多次的调用,以绘制其组成的样式元素。通常,知道widget可以处于的状态和样式选项的其他内容,也就是我们在下一节列出的内容,也就足够了。

trans-unit.source: We ignore QLayoutItem::isEmpty(); this means that the layout will treat hidden widgets as visible.
trans-unit.target: 我们忽略QLayoutItem :: isEmpty（）; 这意味着布局会将隐藏的小部件视为可见。

trans-unit.source: We include a small example where we customize the drawing of item backgrounds.

trans-unit.source: We may also ignore the proposed action, and perform some other action on the data. This ensures that the replacement drop action is used instead of the proposed action.
trans-unit.target: 我们也可能忽略建议的操作，并对数据执行其他操作。为此，我们将在调用accept（）之前，使用Qt :: DropAction的首选操作调用事件对象的setDropAction （）。这样可以确保使用替换放置动作代替提议的动作。

trans-unit.source: We mostly use Java style widgets as examples. The Java style does not draw every element in the element trees. trans-unit.source: We recommend that you connect clean-up code to the aboutToQuit() signal, instead of putting it in your application's main() function because on some platforms the exec() call may not return. For example, on Windows when the user logs off, the system terminates the process after Qt closes all top-level windows. Hence, there is no guarantee that the application will have time to exit its event loop and execute code at the end of the main() function after the exec() call.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议您将清理代码连接到aboutToQuit（）信号，而不是将其放入应用程序的 main() 函数中，因为在某些平台上，exec（）调用可能不会返回。例如，在Windows上，当用户注销时，系统会在Qt关闭所有顶级窗口后终止该过程。因此，不能保证应用程序将有时间退出其事件循环并在exec（）调用之后在 main() 函数的末尾执行代码。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use x() + width() and y() + height() to find the true bottom-right corner, and avoid right() and bottom(). trans-unit.source: We want the <html>, <body>, and <p> nodes we create in the output to be in the standard XHTML namespace, so we declare the default namespace to be http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml. That's correct for the output, but that same default namespace will also be applied to the node names in the path expression we're trying to match in the input (/tests/test[@status = "failure"]), which is wrong, because the namespace used in testResult.xml is perhaps in the empty namespace. So we must declare that namespace too, with a namespace prefix, and then use the prefix with the node names in the path expression. This one will probably work better:
trans-unit.target: 我们希望在输出中创建的 <html> ， <body> 和 <p> 节点位于标准XHTML命名空间中，因此我们将默认命名空间声明为 http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml 。这对于输出是正确的，但是相同的默认名称空间也将应用于我们尝试在输入中匹配的路径表达式中的节点名称（ /tests/test[@status = "failure"] ），这是错误的，因为 testResult.xml 中使用的名称空间可能位于空名称空间中。因此，我们也必须使用名称空间前缀声明该名称空间，然后在路径表达式中将前缀与节点名称一起使用。这可能会更好地工作：

trans-unit.source: We've used the indexIn() function to repeatedly match the regexp in the string. Note that instead of moving forward by one character at a time pos++ we could have written pos += rx.matchedLength() to skip over the already matched string. The count will equal 3, matching 'One Eric another Eirik, and an Ericsson. How many Eiriks, Eric?'; it doesn't match 'Ericsson' or 'Eiriks' because they are not bounded by non-word boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用indexIn（）函数重复匹配字符串中的regexp。请注意，而不是在一个时间一个字符向前移动 pos++ ，我们可以这样写 pos += rx.matchedLength() 跳过已经匹配的字符串。计数等于3，与“一个Eric另一个Eirik和一个爱立信匹配” 。埃里克，埃里克斯有多少？它与“ Ericsson”或“ Eiriks”不匹配，因为它们不受非单词边界的限制。

trans-unit.source: Web browsers usually encode spaces found in HTML FORM elements to a plus sign ("+") and plus signs to its percent-encoded form (%2B). However, the Internet specifications governing URLs do not consider spaces and the plus character equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 网络浏览器通常将HTML FORM元素中的空格编码为加号("+"),将加号编码为其百分比编码形式(%2B)。然而,管理URL的互联网规范不考虑空格和加号的等价性。

trans-unit.source: Web engine notifications are passed to the user in the WebEngineProfile::presentNotification() signal.
trans-unit.target: Web引擎通知通过WebEngineProfile :: presentNotification（）信号传递给用户。

trans-unit.source: Web engine notifications are passed to the user in the QWebEngineProfile::setNotificationPresenter() and QQuickWebEngineProfile::presentNotification() calls and the WebEngineProfile::presentNotification() signal.
trans-unit.target: Web引擎通知通过QWebEngineProfile :: setNotificationPresenter（）和QQuickWebEngineProfile :: presentNotification（）调用以及WebEngineProfile :: presentNotification（）信号传递给用户。

trans-unit.source: Web engine notifications are passed to the user through the custom handler provided with the QWebEngineProfile::setNotificationPresenter() call.
trans-unit.target: Web引擎通知通过QWebEngineProfile :: setNotificationPresenter（）调用提供的自定义处理程序传递给用户。

为终端用户提供网络通知。

trans-unit.source: Web pages can request access to platform features, such as geolocation or audio and video capture devices. The featurePermissionRequested() signal is emitted when a web page requests to make use of a resource. The supported platform features are described by the Feature property. If users grant the permission, the grantFeaturePermission() method is used to set it to
trans-unit.target: 网页可以请求访问平台功能，例如地理位置或音频和视频捕获设备。该featurePermissionRequested（）当一个网页请求利用资源的信号被发射。受支持的平台功能由Feature属性描述。如果用户授予许可，则使用grantFeaturePermission（）方法将其设置为

trans-unit.source: WebAssembly (or webasm) is a bytecode format intended to be executed in a virtual machine inside a web browser. This allows an application to be deployed to a device with a compliant web browser without going through any installation steps. The application will run inside a secure sandbox in the web browser. This makes it appropriate for applications that do not need full access to the device capabilities, but benefits from a swift and uncomplicated installation process.
trans-unit.target: WebAssembly(或webasm)是一种字节码格式,目的是在网络浏览器内的虚拟机中执行。这允许应用程序部署到具有兼容的网络浏览器的设备上,而无需经过任何安装步骤。应用程序将在网络浏览器中的安全沙盒内运行。这使得它适合那些不需要完全访问设备功能的应用程序,但受益于一个快速和简单的安装过程。

trans-unit.source: WebAssembly is a binary format that allows sand-boxed executable code in web pages. This format is nearly as fast as native machine code, and is now supported by all major web browsers.
trans-unit.target: WebAssembly是一种二进制格式,允许在网页中使用沙盒式可执行代码。这种格式几乎和原生机器代码一样快,现在所有主要的网络浏览器都支持这种格式。

trans-unit.source: WebEngineDownloadItem models a download throughout its life cycle, starting with a pending download request and finishing with a completed download. It can be used, for example, to get information about new downloads, to monitor progress, and to pause, resume, and cancel downloads.
trans-unit.target: WebEngineDownloadItem在整个下载的生命周期中为下载建模,从一个待定的下载请求开始,到完成下载结束。例如,它可以用来获取新下载的信息,监控进度,以及暂停、恢复和取消下载。

trans-unit.source: WebEngineProfile contains settings, scripts, and the list of visited links shared by all views that belong to the profile.
trans-unit.target: WebEngineProfile包含设置、脚本和属于该配置文件的所有视图共享的访问链接列表。

trans-unit.source: WebGL is required, even for applications which do not use OpenGL themselves. Most modern browsers support WebGL, but note that some browsers blacklist certain older GPUs. The Qt loader will detect this and display an error message.
trans-unit.target: 即使是本身不使用OpenGL的应用程序也需要WebGL。大多数现代浏览器都支持WebGL,但请注意某些浏览器会将某些旧版GPU列入黑名单。Qt加载器将检测到这一点并显示错误信息。

trans-unit.source: WebSocket is a web-based protocol designed to enable two-way communication between a client application and a remote host. It enables the two entities to send data back and forth if the initial handshake succeeds. WebSocket is the solution for applications that struggle to get real-time data feeds with less network latency and minimum data exchange.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket是一种基于网络的协议,旨在实现客户端应用程序和远程主机之间的双向通信。如果初始握手成功,它可使两个实体来回发送数据。WebSocket是为那些努力以较少的网络延迟和最少的数据交换获取实时数据源的应用提供的解决方案。
